Freshen up your staples with this men's Micro Batwing Stripe T-Shirt from Levi's. In a Navy, Red and White colourway, this regular-fit top has a ribbed crew neckline and short sleeves for a tailored fit. It's made from soft cotton fabric for comfort that lasts. Finished up with a mini Levi's Batwing logo embroidered to the chest. Machine washable. | Our model is 6'1" with a 39" chest and wears a size medium.

Rep it like some of the best in European football with these men's FC Barcelona 2022/23 Home Shorts from Nike. In an Obsidian colourway, these slim-fit shorts are made recycled poly fabric, and feature an elasticated waistband with an internal drawcord for custom comfort. Equipped with sweat-wicking Dri-FIT tech for a cool and dry wear, these shorts are finished off with a Sesame Swoosh logo and the legendary FC Barcelona crest to each leg. Machine washable.

column2: The North Face Recycled '66 Classic Cap
column4: Level up your look with this Recycled '66 Classic Cap from The North Face. Landing in an Orange colourway, this cap is cut from a recycled poly fabric that's lightweight and durable for lasting wear and comfort. It features a six-panel crown, eyelets for breathability and a curved brim for coverage. With an adjustable strap for a perfect fit, it's signed off with TNF branding to the front. Hand wash.

It features short sleeves with a ribbed crew neckline and comes in a standard fit for an easy wear. Finished up with signature Levi's babytab branding to the chest. Machine washable | Our model is 6'0" with a 38" chest and wears a size medium.

column2: adidas Celtic FC Training Polo Shirt
column4: Support your side in this men's Celtic FC Training Polo Shirt from adidas. In a White colourway, this regular-fit polo is made from lightweight, poly-cotton fabric with adidas' AEROREADY tech to wick away sweat. It features a two button placket with a henry collar, as well as short sleeves. With the iconic 3-Stripes, this polo shirt is finished with a Badge of Sport logo and the Celtic FC crest to the chest. Machine washable.|GM7363

Level up on comfort with these men's Donte 2 Track Pants from McKenzie. Exclusive to JD, these standard-fit pants are made from smooth and stretchy poly fabric in a Navy colourway. They feature tapered legs with branded taping to the sides, as well as an elasticated waistband for a custom fit. With side pockets, these tracker pants are finished up with McKenzie branding. Machine washable. | Our model is 5'9" and wears a size medium.

Machine washable. | Our model is 5'11" with a 38" chest and wears a size medium.

Step to the pitch feeling like a pro in these men's Ajax 2021/22 Training Pants from adidas. Machine washable.|GT9568

column4: Show off your handling skills on the pitch with these men's Celtic FC 2021/22 Goalkeeper Third Shorts from adidas. In a Solar Pink colourway that's sure to distract strikers, these regular-fit shorts are made from recycled Primegreen poly fabric. Built with AEROREADY tech for cool comfort on every wear, they feature an elasticated waistband with adjustable drawcords for a secure fit. With 3-Stripes to the sides, these shorts are finished with a Badge Of Sport logo and the legendary Four Leaf Clover crest to the thigh. Machine washable.

Freshen up your skills with these men's Sweden Training Pants from adidas. They're made from smooth recycled poly fabric, with AEROREADY tech that wicks sweat from the skin for cool and dry comfort. These pants are finished off with zippered side pockets for your essentials, a Badge of Sport logo and the Sweden crest to each thigh. Machine washable.|HD8990
